briefTitle: OPTimizing Treatment Focused Genetic Testing IN Cancer
officialTitle: OPTimizing Treatment Focused Genetic Testing IN Cancer - OPT-IN
conditions: Breast Cancer, Ovarian Cancer, Pancreatic Cancer, Prostate Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The measurement of genetic testing uptake
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adult patients over the age of 18
* With a diagnosis of advanced cancer (defined as Stage 3 or 4), or
* Any stage for pancreatic cancer and
* No prior cancer genetic panel testing

Exclusion Criteria:

* Adults unable to consent
* Individuals who are not yet adults (infants, children, teenagers)
* Pregnant women (if known at the time of participation)
* Prisoners
* Non-English speakers
